QuestData.Title: Augustus' Receipt Book
QuestData.Description: I'm ready for business! What do you want?$B$BOh wait... I can't open up shop without my receipt book. How am I to keep track of things without my receipt book?$B$BI must have left it in town somewhere. I had a room in the inn... the book must be there.$B$BBring me my book. Please, bring it to me! Bring me my book and you'll see! I'll set up shop and you'll see that my prices are INSANE!
QuestData.LogDescription: Get Augustus' Receipt Book from the inn in Terrordale.
QuestData.CompletionText: Do you have my receipt book? I can't wait to get back to business!
QuestData.RewardText: There it is! And oh my! I forgot how full it was!$B$BThis is a glorious day, $n! Stupendous! Insanely good, I say!
